content:
Jaris sighs dramatically, and rolls his eyes. “Come on! Are we still going to Greenbriar Knoll or what?”

Rangers Choose

A) Last one there’s a rotten dolewood! Discard all   from Jaris.

B) No. Farewell for now. Discard Jaris and return HELPING HAND to your collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
